
{{alias}}( x, y )
    Returns the minimum value.

    If any argument is `NaN`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        First number.

    y: number
        Second number.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Minimum value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 3.14, 4.2 )
    3.14
    > v = {{alias}}( 3.14, NaN )
    NaN
    > v = {{alias}}( +0.0, -0.0 )
    -0.0

    See Also
    --------
